AboutMe.text1: Bachelor's degree in Computer Engineering (Software) from KIAU.
AboutMe.text2: One year of experience teaching English at a language institute.
AboutMe.text3: Proficiency in JavaScript programming language and React library, experience with C# and WordPress, familiarity with Next.js.
AboutMe.text4: Learning TypeScript is one of the main goals in the near future.
AboutMe.text5: Interested in learning, responsible, organized, and hardworking.

projects.banklist: A banking platform with a customer website and a responsive employee web app, built in JS for managing transactions with a smooth UI, advanced filters, and practical use of array methods
projects.findish: This project is a fully responsive recipe application developed using pure JavaScript (Vanilla JS) and SASS, allowing users to search, discover, and add various recipes to their list
projects.goal_tracker: A responsive React web app for tracking goals based on their prioritization. The app has a progress bar to display the status of completed goals and is coded using React Hooks and advanced concepts like forwardRef
projects.rateflicks: A fully responsive React application for movie rating. Features include searching for movies and displaying based on ratings. Capabilities such as search, data fetching from API. I have also used react-spinners and react-toastify
projects.stelix: A full-stack project using React, Vite, React Query, Supabase, and many other technologies. A hotel reception system that includes authentication, reservation management, CRUD operations, advanced forms, and an analytical dashboard
projects.stelix_website: My first project with Next.js alongside React and Tailwindcss, originally the client site for our previous project, Stelix. This website is fully responsive and built on professional coding principles for a hotel suite booking system
projects.telenote: A complete social network web app developed using MERN. Users can create accounts and share their activities and moments with others. Features include CRUD operations, liking, commenting, advanced search, and pagination
projects.title: Projects
projects.track_map: A responsive web app that allows users to track and record their activities based on their current location or any desired place using various APIs like Big Data Cloud and OpenStreetMap for accurate and interactive maps
projects.travex: A responsive project with React using useReducer and Context API for state management. An interactive map using leaflet. Tools such as Datepicker, React-toastify, react-router-dom for a pleasant user experience
projects.zesty: Responsive web app for ordering food from restaurants using React + Vite. This app also utilizes Three.js and Redux Toolkit, providing a delightful user experience

skills.csharp: Familiar with the CSharp programming language
skills.database: Proficient in SQL Server and MySQL
skills.title: Skills
